item.title: RÃ­gille's programming guide
item.description: i’m still writing that guide, expect drafts and changes. also feel free to make suggestions with an issue or a pull request. ðŸ™‚ Introduction Computers can help people in many many different ways. When told to, they can draw a webpage, put you inside a game world, point a rocket towards space, prove theorems… I can’t think of any other machine that can do so many things. However if you’re here I suppose they don’t do exactly what you need yet.
